title: Farrukh regards Maryam as heir of Nawaz Sharif’s corruption, money laundering
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 11 (APP): Minister of State for Information and Broadcasting Farrukh Habib on Sunday regarded Pakistan Muslim League-Nawaz (PML-N) Vice President Maryam Safdar as an heir of her father Nawaz Sharif’s corruption and money laundering.
مریم صفدر نواز شریف کی کرپشن اور منی لانڈرنگ کی وارث ہے۔ کشمیر کے لوگ ان سے پوچھ رہے جب مودی بطور مہمان خصوصی انکے گھر شادی پر آیا تھا تو اس وقت کشمیر آزادی  کی بات کیوں نہیں کی۔ آڑ یا پاڑ کرنے والے آجکل ہر جگہ  NRO کے لیے خوار ہورہے ہے۔
— Farrukh Habib (@FarrukhHabibISF) July 11, 2021
In a tweet, he said those who once talked of ‘now and never’ in politics were nowadays out to seek an NRO (National Reconciliation Ordinance) like concession.
Chiding Maryam over her party’s election campaign in the Azad Jammu and Kashmir (AJK), he said the people of Kashmir were asking from the Sharif family as to why they did not called for the valley’s independence when Modi attended a wedding at their home as a chief guest.
